source:
%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_curated_db.Employee_Details AS

WITH Employee_Data AS (
    -- First part of the UNION from historical SAP data
    SELECT DISTINCT
        CONCAT(RIGHT(hist_sap.PersNo, 6), '-', REPLACE(hist_sap.Report_MonthEnd_Date, '-', '')) AS PersonReportMonthEndKey,
        hist_sap.Lastname,
        hist_sap.Firstname,
        CONCAT(hist_sap.Firstname, ' ', hist_sap.Lastname) AS EmpFullName,
        hist_sap.NameofManagerOM AS Manager,
        hist_sap.CounterSignManager AS Manager_L2,
        hist_sap.EmployeeNo as EmployeeNo,
        hist_sap.PersNo as PersonNo,
        hist_Sap.location as Location
    FROM odw_harmonised_db.hist_sap_hr hist_sap
    WHERE hist_sap.Firstname is not null

    UNION ALL

    -- Second part of the UNION from leavers data
    SELECT DISTINCT
        CONCAT(RIGHT(a.PersNo, 6), '-', '00000000') AS PersonReportMonthEndKey,
        a.Lastname,
        a.Firstname,
        CONCAT(a.Firstname, ' ', a.Lastname) AS EmpFullName,
        a.NameofManagerOM AS Manager,
        NULL AS Manager_L2,
        a.EmployeeNo as EmployeeNo,
        a.PersNo as PersonNo,
        a.location as Location
    FROM odw_harmonised_db.load_SAP_HR_Leavers a
    WHERE a.Firstname is not null
    AND NOT EXISTS (
        SELECT 1 
        FROM odw_harmonised_db.Hist_SAP_HR b 
        WHERE a.PersNo = b.PersNo
    )
)

-- Final select with join to inspector data
SELECT DISTINCT 
    e.*,
    insp.inspector_postcode
FROM Employee_Data e  -- Changed from EmployeeData to Employee_Data
LEFT OUTER JOIN (
    SELECT * 
    FROM odw_harmonised_db.Live_dim_inspector 
    WHERE activestatus = 'ACTIVE' 
    AND ISNULL(resourcegroup, '') <> 'NSI'
) insp ON (e.PersonNo = insp.pinsstaffnumber OR e.EmployeeNo = insp.pinsstaffnumber);
